title: PM convenes emergency meeting on economic situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has called an emergency meeting on the economic situation of the country, the PM Office said Wednesday.
The meeting will be attended by the economic team and top officials related to the economy.
The meeting will evaluate the factors for the recent hike in the value of  dollar and the measures to address it.
The prime minister’s economic team will give a briefing on the country’s economic situation and the reasons for devaluation of the rupee against dollar.
